Header.title: Busy Bees Addis
Header.paragraph: Where imagination and joyful learning blossoms!

About.paragraph: Our day care and preschool programs are carefully designed to encourage each child’s growing need for independence and an emerging sense of self while nurturing intellectual, growth, exploration, and socialization in a safe, supportive environment. Our classrooms not only feature a variety of working spaces that encourage small group work and cooperative learning activities, but they also use learning centers that allow children to explore areas that interest them. Each center features skills as language and reading, construction , home living, math, fine and gross motor skills, art, dramatic play, science and sensory exploration. Each area helps your child your child gain independence and further explore themes and concepts introduced in class with a hands-on, interactive approach for child development.
Why: Exploring with letters, language and phonics
Interdisciplinary lessons in STEAM learning (Science, Technology, Art, Math, and Engineering)
Amharic, Geez and French learning centers

Team.name: Abdilfetah Yasin
Team.description: Greetings! I am Abdi, co-founder of Busy Bees Addis, a visionary project aiming to create a remarkable early learning center in Addis Ababa. Currently living in Australia, I bring valuable expertise from my background in education, youth work, and social work to Busy Bees Addis. Our goal is to provide a safe, joyful space for children to play, explore, learn, and socialize. I am committed to upholding high standards and creating an exceptional learning environment. In my free time, I enjoy reading, watching documentaries, hiking, baking, playing games, and practicing taekwondo. With Busy Bees Addis, I will contribute new ideas and ensure the availability of school materials. Let's embark on this exciting journey together, nurturing the growth and happiness of every child we serve.

Team.name: Tsigereda Alemayehu
Team.description: My Name is Tsigereda (Hannah) Alemayehu.  It has been 14 amazing and beautiful years working, Head to Toe Early learning center and Little Einstein's early learning center of teaching Infants, Toddlers and early preschoolers!  With those each wonderful years I believe that I added extra happiness and blessing in my life. I am happily married with four handsome boys. I am very energetic, to be back from after one year preparing school set up. It always makes me happy to see children play, grow and learn new skills every day. I am looking forward to having a wonderful year with both you and your child.

Team.name: Eyassu yemaneberhan
Team.description: Hello there my name is Eyassu Yemaneberhan. I'm a co-founder of Busy Bees Addis. I have been a teacher in early childhood development for the past eight years. Both in the toddlers and early preschool group. Teaching children is passion of mine. I'm sure that we will have great time with your family!

Team.name: Maraki Abebaw
Team.description: Hello! My name is Maraki Abebaw and I am the director of learning at Busy Bees Addis Early learning center. Before moving to this position I have been an educator for 12 years. I started my career working with three year olds and have gained experience in the passing years with all early childhood education in various program structures.I have also worked as a deputy director for four years providing leadership and guidance for my team. I love to create contemporary art whenever I can make the time. I'm very excited to be working with you all!

Contact.address: D.A.R sahara st, Addis Ababa , Ethiopia

Features.title: Greeting
Features.text: The first thing that greets you when you enter to our school is the office staff. Their actions set the tone for the rest of the school. If the front office is inviting for teachers, parents, and students, then the school leadership values customer service

Features.title: Communication and Parent Involvment
Features.text: Busy Bees Addis truly believes in the importance of staying connected! Our staff communicates daily via email, phone calls, texts and weekly updates parents how their child’s day went. We are active on our website and share every month our activities, events and learning journey. Busy Bees Addis encourages parents to be and active in their child’s learning journey. Our social media pages actively showcases our students learning process every day. Drop by and check us out!

Features.title: Small - Group Setting
Features.text: Busy Bees Addis Early Learning Center offers much smaller teacher/student ratios. Our typical class ratio for age group 6months – 3years is one teacher to every five student. Older students from age 4-6 years old are one teacher to every six student. However, student’s age grouped from 6months – 1 year and half are required to come with their nannies.
